action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Crack Muck {@recharge 5}
entries: The muddo hill giant grabs a handful of crack muck and launches it out in a 15-feet cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. As an action the {@condition blinded} creature can wipe th muck off it.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the muddo hill giant must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the muddo hill giant's stench for 24 hours.
